snippet.title: Polymega Gameplays - Kickboxing Knockout [PlayStation - PAL]
snippet.description:
Known in Japan as "Simple 1500 Series Vol. 64: The Kickboxing", this game is very similar to All-Star Boxing (aka Simple 1500 Series Vol. 32: The Boxing) sharing a lot of the same characters. It also features similar gameplay mechanics of that game, with the exception that this game allows the addition of being able to kick instead of just punch.

Simple Series © D3Publisher
Published in Europe by Midas Interactive
Developed by Jorudan Co. Ltd.
BIOS Used: Polymega BIOS
